WorkflowSteps.Instruction: Curzon Hall Lobby Court West external Gates can be unlocked remotely.
Curzon Hall Lobby staircase pressurisation can be triggered from fire alarm.
WorkflowSteps.HelpText: Must inform control room if triggering fire alarm.

WorkflowSteps.Instruction: Confirm with event manager on final event requirements and special needs.  Provide link to event preparation contract.
WorkflowSteps.HelpText: View event booking calendar. On the calendar, link to event contract.

WorkflowSteps.Instruction: If required by the event, engage Energy team for pre-event check.
WorkflowSteps.HelpText: Any cabling on special electricity supply? Backup generators ready?
Link to security plan for the event.

Details.Name: Event Prep Master
Details.Description: This procedure shall be completed 48hours before any events.  This procedure is for Convention Centre buildings.
